recipe: Apple Juice to the first line, whole milk to the second line. 3 pumps of cinnamon dolce syrup. 3 pumps of Cream Base. 2 Pumps Dark Caramel (or regular caramel). Top with Whipped Cream, Caramel Ribbon Crunch, Caramel Drizzle and Cinnamon Dolce topping.

name: Key Lime Pie Frappuccino
recipe: Start with Cool Lime juice to the bottom black line. Whole milk to the second black line. 2 pumps white mocha. 2 pumps vanilla syrup. 1 pump of cinnamon dolce syrup. Whipped cream blended in. Top with whipped cream and toasted coconut if available.

name: Peppermint Pow Frappuccino
recipe: Nonfat Vanilla Bean Frappuccino. Add peppermint syrup (1 pump for a tall, 2 for grande, 3 for venti). 2 scoops of matcha green tea for tall, 2.5 for grande, 3 for venti. Top with whipped cream if desired.

name: Mint White Chocolate Crumble Frappuccino
recipe: White Mocha Frappuccino. Add java chips. Add 2 pumps of peppermint syrup. Add 1 scoop of matcha green tea powder. Top with whipped cream and cookie crumbles.

name: Peach Raspberry Crisp Frappuccino
recipe: Vanilla Bean Frappuccino. Add raspberry syrup, 1 pump tall, 1.5 grande, 2 for venti. Add peach syrup, , 1 pump tall, 1.5 grande, 2 for venti. Top with whipped cream.

name: Nutella Frappuccino
recipe: Regular coffee frappuccino. 2 pumps of mocha syrup. 1 pump of hazelnut syrup. whipped cream blended in. Top with whipped cream! Caramel drizzle is optional.

name: Vanilla & Chocolate Chip Ice Cream Frappuccino
recipe: Vanilla Bean Frappuccino. Add Mocha Syrup (1 pump tall, 1.5 pumps grande, 2 pumps venti). Add java chips. Top with whipped cream, cookie crumble and mocha drizzle.

name: Teddy Grahams Frappuccino
recipe: Start with a Coffee Frappuccino. Add Cinnamon Dolce Syrup (1 pump tall, 2 pumps grande, 3 pumps venti). Add Vanilla Syrup (1/2 pump tall, 1 pump grande, 1.5 pumps for a venti). Add honey.

name: Cinnamon Toast Crunch Frappuccino
recipe: White Mocha Frappuccino. Add Cinnamon Dolce syrup (1 pump for tall, 1.5 for grande, 2 for venti). Add Hazelnut syrup (1 pump for tall, 1,5 for grande, 2 for venti). Cinnamon sugar blended in. Top with whipped cream and more cinnamon sugar.

name: Snickerdoodle Frappuccino
recipe: Chai Creme Frappuccino w/ Soy Milk. Add cinnamon dolce syrup (1.5 pumps tall, 2 pumps grande, 2.5 pumps venti). Top with cinnamon dolce sprinkles.

name: Apple Pie Frappuccino
recipe: Fill to first line with cream base. Fill to second line with apple juice. Add cinnamon dolce syrup (1 pump for a tall, 1.5 for a grande, 2 for a venti). Add caramel syrup (1 pump for a tall, 1.5 for a grande, 2 for a venti).

name: Turtles Frappuccino
recipe: Java Chip Frappuccino. Add toffee nut syrup (1 pump for a tall, 2 for grande, 3 for venti). Top with mocha and caramel drizzle.

name: French Vanilla Frappuccino
recipe: Vanilla Bean Frappuccino. Add Hazelnut Syrup (1 pump tall, 1.5 pumps grande, 2 pumps venti). Line the cup, and top with caramel drizzle.

name: Tuxedo Mocha Frappuccino
recipe: Order a mocha, hot or cold. Made with half white chocolate mocha and half regular mocha. Add java chips and top with mocha drizzle.

name: Raspberry Cheesecake Frappuccino
recipe: White Chocolate Mocha Frappuccino. Add Raspberry Syrup (1 pump tall, 1.5 grande, 2 venti).

name: Grasshopper Frappuccino
recipe: Mocha Frappuccino. Add Java Chips. Add Peppermint Syrup (1 pump tall, 2 pumps grande, 3 pumps venti).

name: Banana Nut Frappuccino
recipe: Hazelnut Frappuccino – Grande or Venti. Whole banana blended in.

name: Chocolate Caramel Pretzel Frappuccino
recipe: Java chip Frappuccino. Add a pump of caramel syrup. A whole chocolate caramel pretzel (Blend only half). Topped with whipped cream and caramel drizzle. Add the 2nd half of the pretzel as decoration/a scoop!.
